programme.desc: Turbo Drift - The snails and Tito travel to Tokyo to film a commercial and Turbo is challenged to a drift race against a beautiful and mysterious female cricket.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep9
programme.desc: Home Alone - Aggro, Burple and Cutter are left alone in the roost to care for some dragon eggs, but a trio of tricky Slinkwings want those eggs for themselves.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep35
programme.desc: Crazy Maze / Super Sneaks - Archibald and Sage enter an endurance race through the corn maze to end all corn mazes. / Thinking his new sneakers have made him super-fast, Archibald gets roped into delivering ice cream for a couple of new-to-town entrepreneurs.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep11
programme.desc: The Poppy Horror Picture Show / Dinkles Dinkles Little Star - After hearing a scary story Poppy tries to help Biggie get over his fearsHoping to enhance Mr. Dinkles selfconfidence Biggie enters him into a Bergen pet show.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep19
programme.desc: House Touchers/The Transformation - When Rocksy is accidentally flung inside the humans' house, Berry and Twig go on a wild adventure to bring her back. / Rocksy is upset when she finds out all her friends will evolve, but she will always be a pebble. Rocksy tries various attempts to challenge her nature.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep11
programme.desc: Mouse - Artephius tries to warn the town when an evil mouse charms his way into San Lorenzo – but no one will listen to him.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep21
programme.desc: Edge Of Disaster Pt 1 - When Ruffnut is captured by Dragon Hunters, it's up to Astrid and Tuffnut to defend Dragon's Edge from the invading Dragon Hunter army Dragon's Edge from the invading Dragon Hunter army

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep22
programme.desc: Edge Of Disaster Pt 2 - Unaware of the war on Dragon's Edge, Hiccup, Snotlout and Johann discover an island full of dragons that have been wounded by the Dragon Hunters

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep21
programme.desc: Plushythingy - When Frederic Estes creates the cutest plushy ever that is the hottest toy in town, the field team must destroy the last remaining one but are powerless against its cuteness

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep23
programme.desc: Picture Perfect - Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep21
programme.desc: Night of the White Bone Demon - In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep22
programme.desc: Rise of the Empress - On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep11
programme.desc: Mouse - Artephius tries to warn the town when an evil mouse charms his way into San Lorenzo – but no one will listen to him.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep41
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Players - It's time for the Toyland football match but the game can't go ahead until Noddy finds the missing players. Noddy discovers that someone misdirected Pat Pat and Deltoid so that they'd miss the match. Noddy finds the missing players and reunites everyone at the real football pitch but then Hoof disappears. Noddy discovers that Hoof misdirected the others because he wanted to be the best player. Hoof learns that football is a team sport where all the team members need to work together to make it the best game ever. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep42
programme.desc: The Case Of The Changed Basketball Hoop - Noddy's about to play a game of basketball with Big Ears and Deltoid when he realizes that the hoop has been fiddled with. Who could've done that and why? Noddy's investigation leads him to Fuse, who explains that he just wanted to help the toys that weren't as skilled as him. Everyone practises and realises that the best way to improve at sport is to keep practising. Well done Noddy.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep43
programme.desc: The Case Of The Ruined Crops - Farmer Tom is confused and upset when he finds all his trees and corn knocked over. Noddy decides to investigate: who spoiled Farmer Tom's crops? He soon discovers lots of strange heavy bags scattered all over the farm. Whose are they? Where did they come from? And what could they possibly have to do with Smartysaurus's new hot air balloon?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep44
programme.desc: The Case Of The Broken Pulley - The Head Builder isn't happy. Someone's been playing with the builders' stuff and now their pulley doesn't work. Noddy decides he needs to find out who did it before anything else goes wrong. Who broke the Builders' pulley?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep41
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Noisy Challenge - Crocky challenges Raa Raa to make a noise with everything in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Will Raa Raa succeed?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep42
programme.desc: Catch The Page - Topsy is trying to read, but Raa Raa and the other jungle animals are all racing around making too much noise. Topsy is so upset she accidentally rips the last page from her book… can her friends set off on a noisy chase through the jungle to find it?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep43
programme.desc: Raa Raa Gets Squeaky - Raa Raa is in a particularly helpful mood and offers to help everyone take provisions for the picnic to Rockywockyville for them. But he doesn't arrive in time, everyone sets out to see what has happened to their noisy little lion friend

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep44
programme.desc: Wake Up Huffty - The animals are all looking forward to waking up early to watch the dawn chorus, but Huffty doesn't stir when the alarm goes off. Can Raa Raa and the others wake the sleeping elephant in time?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep41
programme.desc: Roary's Demolition Derby - Roary is in a mischievous mood and keeps crashing into things. Big Chris has a great idea how Roary can burn up all his energy and be helpful at the same time!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep42
programme.desc: Manners Please - Farmer Green and FB are very nervous about going to Mama Mia's garden party. James and the other cars offer to teach them how to behave at such an event. But everything doesn't quite go to plan…

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep43
programme.desc: Big Chris' Big Jump - Big Chris has agreed to do a parachute jump for charity but loses his nerve on the big day. Can Roary talk him through it, just like Big Chris did for him when he got scared?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep44
programme.desc: Brassless Bandfinal - The brass band booked for the Silver Hatch parade have cancelled. Mr Carburettor will be furious if he doesn't have music at his parade. Roary and his friends think up an ingenious plan...

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep21
programme.desc: Power Outage Part 3 + 4 - Power Outage – Part 3: Escape from Scare School Things worsen when a leprechaun, Razznik, steals the magical cleptor that now holds all of Scare School's powers. Power Outage – Part 4: The Final Battle On a hunt for ghostly powers, the evil leprechaun orders Deedstown to hand over Casper's uncles, OR ELSE.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep22
programme.desc: Ghost In The Gallery / Wart On The Nose - Ghost in the Gallery After hearing reports of a ghost stealing artwork from the Deedstown Museum, Casper becomes convinced that his uncles are involved. Wart on the Nose When Professor Thurdigree Burns comes down with dragon flu, Casper, Mantha and Ra are tasked with finding a cure.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep19
programme.desc: Fugitive's Day Out - Boss Baby is framed for leaking info about the Stinkless Serum to PuppyCo and must flee on the run via Errand Day with the family

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep20
programme.desc: El Apasionado Negocio de la Niñera - Frederic makes a play to take over the town's babysitters by instituting "senior sitting"

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep62
programme.desc: Dances With Dingoes - A laid-back, festival-loving dingo emerges from the portal and teaches the orphans to boogie, but Puss soon learns the dance instructor has secret intentions

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep10
programme.desc: Remote Out of Control / Critter Comfort - Biggie takes Branchs superpowered remote but must return it before Branch finds outWhen Poppy builds a new home for a group of cute critters she accidentally attracts their predators.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep36
programme.desc: Get Off My Lawn - When King Julien thinks he's a crime victim, he buys the village self-defense scorpions from a shady dealer, leaving everyone armed and dangerous.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep10
programme.desc: Lucky And The Harvest Hunt - Lucky takes part in a secret Miradero tradition a nighttime scavenger hunt

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep10
programme.desc: Yukon Do It! - Arf gets a chance to run with real sled dogs when he travels with Wally and Wenda to wintry northern Canada to deliver an important package to Wizard Whitebeard, who is off watching the Northern Lights with a fellow wizard.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep10
programme.desc: Slobber Power - Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep19
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Clippy Claws - Pat has a very special delivery today! Micawber's claws need clipping and Pat needs to deliver not only the claw clippers but Amy the vet too! On the way to the lighthouse though they encounter all sorts of animals needing help today – from a poorly Bonnie with a cold to a fretful Pumpkin who doesn't want to take his horse pills! Meanwhile, poor Micawber's claws are so long and he's so upset by getting them tangled up in things like Chris's scarf and the lighthouse tablecloth that he flies out of the window, carrying the tangled lighthouse keys in his claws! Chris tries to get them back and finds himself locked out of the lighthouse altogether! Luckily, Pat and Amy arrive in the SDS helicopter. Pat lowers Amy down to Micawber who is perched on top of the lighthouse and she's soon able to clip his claws and retrieve the keys. Phew! Well done Amy and well done Pat!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep20
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Sorting Machine - Pat and Jess are called to Cardiff to collect a new sorting machine when the Pencaster machine breaks down. Whilst they negotiate with Rowena Roberts, the Cardiff sorting office manager, as to how to move the heavy machine onto the SDS plane, Ben is fighting his own battles at the Pencaster office as his merry band of “helpers” from the village cause more chaos in their attempts to sort the post!After a quick tour of Gilbertson Castle, Pat and Jess manage to get the new sorting machine to Pencaster just in time to deliver a missing birthday present to Meera. Happy Birthday Meera – and well done, Postman Pat!

programme.title: Olivia Ep19
programme.desc: Olivia Leads A Parade - As Mother tries to get baby William to sleep, Olivia, Ian and Julian create a backyard parade. When Francine finds out, she decides she's going to make her OWN parade. Olivia eventually sees that two parades can be better than one –and even figures out how to keep fussy William asleep.

programme.title: Olivia Ep20
programme.desc: Olivia Tends To The Sick - Julian comes down with a case of “itchyfootitis,” so it's Dr. Olivia to the rescue, with all kinds of silly treatments. When the “condition” begins to spread to others, Olivia imagines herself running an entire “itchy foot” clinic, and eventually discovers the perfect cure.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep19
programme.desc: Heavy Loader - Roary takes Loada on a jaunt to the beach… only to discover that sand and lorries don't mix too well!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep20
programme.desc: Testing Time For Maxi - PC Pete and Nick are up at Silver hatch giving the cars their road tests. Is Maxi really going to be as good as he says he is or will he be unpleasantly surprised?

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep36
programme.desc: Robo Family / The Phantom of Pointy Peak! - In an effort to make sure he stays safe while home alone, Loy leaves Archibald with supervising robots. But Archibald turns them into robotic versions of his siblings. / While on a trip with his siblings, Archibald injures his legs skiing and is forced to stay in the lodge. But when he spots the rumored Phantom of Pointy Peak, Archibald gets wrapped up in the mystery.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep11
programme.desc: Friday Night Liyotes - When Grug won't let her join his winning team, Eep forms her own underdog team in the first-ever sports competition – Ahhh! Valley's annual Egg Toss.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep10
programme.desc: Lucky And The Harvest Hunt - Lucky takes part in a secret Miradero tradition a nighttime scavenger hunt

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep10
programme.desc: The Great Brain Robbery / Can't Purr-y Love - A brain freeze inspires Melvin to make up for all of his wrongs! Lotta does everything she can to win over a little kitten.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep10
programme.desc: Ready, Set, Glow / Breakneck's Back - In order to investigate one of Skidmark's conspiracy theories, Turbo and Skid join a dangerous underground zip line race/The crew is surprised when Whiplash enters the town's annual Tomato Games. Turbo discovers that Whiplash is really trying to keep an eye on an untrustworthy snail who is Whiplash's former mentor.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep10
programme.desc: Slobber Power - Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep36

But when he spots the rumored Phantom of Pointy Peak, Archibald gets wrapped up in the mystery.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep12
programme.desc: The Party Games / Trolly Tales - Everyone gets excited because its time for the Trolls Annual funbased Party GamesPoppy and Branch try to convince the Troll kids that the library is fun.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep20
programme.desc: Ice, Ice, Berry/Venomous Bush Viper - After an ice storm coats the yard in the slippery stuff, Leaf convinces the Mighty Ones that their reflections are evil doppelgangers. / When a venomous bush viper swallows Rocksy, the Mighty Ones must venture into the snake's stomach in order to save her.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep12
programme.desc: Goblin - Cleevil, an orphan goblin, seeks refuge in San Lorenzo – but, unbeknownst to Puss, he is in cahoots with the Duchess.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep23
programme.desc: Shock And Awe - When a new dragon is found in Edge Cove, the Dragon Riders must help the Sea Shocker escape a group of hungry Scauldrons

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep24
programme.desc: A Time To Skrill - When the Skrill returns with a vendetta against Hiccup and Toothless, the Dragon Riders must choose a new course of action to stop the vicious dragon

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep24
programme.desc: Play It Again, Tim - When Tim is forced to take piano lessons, he actually enjoys them and Boss Baby realizes that Tim is being brainwashed by his piano teacher, slowly turning Tim into an old man

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep25
programme.desc: Research & Developments - Turtleneck wants to crack the Stinkless Serum formula and makes it a competition, pitting worker babies against worker babies, stating that the first one to the Serum will be the new CEO!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep23
programme.desc: Bridge Over Troubled Lava - The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep24
programme.desc: House of Flying Pandas - The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep45
programme.desc: The Case Of The Big Pile of Cabbages - When Noddy comes to give Smartysaurus an invitation to Queen Sparklewings's picnic, there's a big pile of cabbages blocking her front door. Noddy investigates: who left the big pile of cabbages there and why? And will he be able to solve the case in time for the Royal Picnic?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep46
programme.desc: The Case Of The Queen's Special Gift - The Knights have been away travelling around Toyland and they each return with a special gift for the Queen. But the last Knight to arrive back was so busy having fun that he forgot to bring back a present for the Queen. Noddy assures him the Queen won't mind but the poor Knight is adamant he must give her something. Noddy sets out to help him find the perfect gift.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep47
programme.desc: The Case of the Pirates' Missing Treasure - When the Pockets find an old treasure map, the Pirates are delighted. They race off to find the treasure. Only to come back rather confused. They found a treasure chest but it ran away! Noddy investigates: "What's happened to the Pirates' treasure?"

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep48
programme.desc: The Case Of The Frozen Toys - Noddy and Big Ears come to Fable Forest to see the Queen Sparklewings's magic crystal collection. But when they arrive at the Fairy Castle, they find all the toys there frozen like statues. What's going on. It's up to Noddy to investigate and help his friends return to their normal selves.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep45

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Danny's Pirate Party - It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep125
programme.desc: The Trip to the Moon - Christopher dreams to visit the moon so his friends make his wish come true. Bubu makes a rocket ship in cardboard and the friends make Christopher an outfit with everything he will need during the trip to the moon.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Spider - Anna and Froga are completely freaked out when they learn a spider lives in Ron's treehouse with him! Ron tries his best to convince his friends that the spider is harmless.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep214
programme.desc: What I Like About Blue - It's LOVE DAY! Josh and Blue LOVE Love Day, and Blue is making YOU something very special. While we play Blue's Clues to figure out what she's making, we help Slippery finish his Love Day Cards and help cheer up our sad Heart Friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Pups Save a Dragon / Pups Save Three Little Pigs - A fantasy fire breathing dragon comes to life and won’t let Ryder and pups into the Lookout! Paw Patrol takes to the Air Patroller! // The Paw Patrol help three little pigs build new houses after theirs mysteriously disappear.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep915
programme.desc: Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf - When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Crystal catastrophe / Good Steel bad Steel - Dinky the baby turtle is given a special courage crystal by Jade but Sir Steel thinks will boost his Mech Suit's powers. // What's worse than Sir Steel? Two Sir Steels! Can the Deer Squad spot the real one with Muffin's help?

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep205
programme.desc: The wig of power / The duck who parped wolf - Steel Tower is under new management not once but twice - can the Deer Squad return it to a distraught Sir Steel? // Steel and Lady Fluffpot are putting up a play. Ian's false alarms frustrate Kai, but one of them turns out to be a REAL emergency!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Paddington and the FIngertrap / Paddington Rides a Scooter - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a Chinese fingertrap and Paddington gets stuck to Mr. Curry while auditioning for a play. // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy play imaginary games and Judy and Mateo decide they might have more fun playing with them.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Bread - Tiny Chef bakes bread but forgets to watch his rising dough and needs to think fast when the dough grows too big!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches - The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Let Justice Be done / The Great Spring Clean - Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Blizzard Wizard - When the owner of Iceberg Ice Cream, Scoops, has to rush out on a frosty emergency, he leaves Baby Shark and William in charge of his parlor.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Fort Fin-ship / Water Buggin - When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. // When a noisy water bug takes up residence in the Shark's home, the family will do whatever it takes to reclaim the peace and quiet they lost.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep135
programme.desc: The Remember-ator - Froga can't seem to remember anything today! Even her piano lesson with Christopher! S+he decides to put sticky notes all around the house as reminders. But it is not very convenient! Bubu offers to be her reminder, friends the best reminders of all!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Mosquito - Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep127
programme.desc: Impatient Christopher - Christopher can hardly wait for his birthday tomorrow, he delivers invitations to his friends, he tries to figure out what present they are preparing for him. Christopher learns that sleeping is the fastest way for tomorrow to come sooner!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep128
programme.desc: The Statue of Friendship - Anna is inspired to create a statue of Froga but she runs out of clay. On her search to find more, she and her friends agree to each make their own special statues out of different materials. The best statue to build is one they build together!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Ukulele - Anna, Froga and Ron make up a song that Anna plays on her ukulele. But they accidentally end up breaking her cherished instrument in half! Ron and Froga do everything they can to stop Anna from finding out, finally they need to confess their mistake.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Cuddle Toy - Christopher is sad because he lost his cuddly toy so Bubu gives him his to use. But when Christopher looses that one too, it's a desperate search for missing cuddlies until Anna saves the day!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rongisõit - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep129
programme.desc: Pancakes - Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep130

programme.desc: It's Time For a Boat Ride - JoJo and Gran Gran bump into Ned and Monty as they walk along the canal. Ned invites them onboard to go on a boat ride, where JoJo gets to act as captain - on the lookout for treasure!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep37
programme.desc: Silence for Stan - When Stan is sick and resting in bed, Monty tries to find a quiet game to play but wonders if all the best games are noisy.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep36
programme.desc: Crowded House - The Kazoops house is feeling a bit crowded, so Monty imagines what it would be like if he and Jimmy Jones lived by themselves.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep35
programme.desc: Postman - When Mum and Dad have a disagreement, Bluey makes Dad write a love letter to Mum to make up. Bluey must find a way to play Ground's Lava with Bingo and deliver the letter to Mum, without squabbling.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep22
programme.desc: The Shadow Badge - There has been a power cut, but luckily Duggee has torches for everybody and the squirrels use them to make shadows.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep21
programme.desc: The Collecting Badge - Duggee is cleaning his biscuit tin collection, and the squirrels are inspired to make their own collections and then display their precious things in the clubhouse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep20
programme.desc: The Yoga Badge - The squirrels are all hyped up with bundles of energy. Things are starting to get a bit frantic, and Duggee needs to calm them all down. Fortunately, he has his Yoga Badge.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep44
programme.desc: Maasai Mara National Park, Kenya - The team roars into action as Glitch tries to take a selfie with a lion in the Maasai Mara.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep43
programme.desc: Cappadocia, Turkey - A game of hide and seek threatens to topple the fairy chimneys of Cappadocia in Turkey.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep34
programme.desc: Cafe - In the park, Bluey meets a new playmate named Winnie, but when Bluey wants to invite her and her dad home for breakfast, she learns that adults take a little bit longer to make friends.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep33
programme.desc: Swim School - Mum, Dad, and Bingo must complete both their classes to pass swim school, but pleasing strict Big Fish instructor Margaret (aka Bluey) is proving to be very difficult.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1) Ep9
programme.desc: Andy and the Capuchins - Andy heads to Brazil and meets a troop of capuchin monkeys who lead him to some honey.

programme.title: Ranger Hamza's Eco Quest (S1) Ep9
programme.desc: Hedges - Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how hedges play an important role in the environment.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S6) Ep21
programme.desc: Seafood a la Slurp - Cook boasts that he can cook absolutely anything, so Captain HeyHo orders him to make her favourite dish - Seafood à la Slurp.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep19
programme.desc: The River Badge - Duggee has a package that needs delivering right at the other end of the river. It looks like the squirrels are going to have a day out on the boat! Good job Duggee has his River badge!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep18
programme.desc: The Making Friends Badge - The squirrels make new friends, play games and have a picnic at a Jamboree. They meet another group of young animals with their very own version of Duggee but everything they do is different.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep17
programme.desc: The Camping Badge - Duggee and the squirrels are going camping, so they build a tent. Then the squirrels hear a scary noise outside the tent. What can it be? All sorts of things are imagined. DUGGEE!!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep42
programme.desc: Hong Kong, China - The Go Jetters spring into action when Glitch's mini-master toys invade Hong Kong Harbour.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep41
programme.desc: Lake Retba, Senegal - The team gets all shook up when Glitch sucks up the pink water of Senegal's Milkshake Lake.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S14) Ep16
programme.desc: Jumping Jobi Wood - Thomas is ordered to collect some precious Jobi wood from Misty Island. Chaos ensues when naughty crane Old Wheezy starts throwing the logs everywhere.

programme.desc: Toggle Tangle - After Sarah helps Scarf Lady prepare the wool for her new roof, she settles down for a dreamy sleep.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep33
programme.desc: Bubble Bumbling - The Bubble Man is in town so a visit to the Big Shop is in order for Sarah, Duck and Donkey.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep14

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep34

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep3

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep2

programme.desc: The Medicine Badge - Duggee's not very well, he's lost his voice. The squirrels want to make him feel better. Duggee tries to tell them that he needs some water but the squirrels don't quite understand.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep15

programme.desc: Funny Business / Snow Bored - Lincoln becomes Luan's clown assistant but starts hogging the spotlight. // The Loud kids set out to show Lisa what is 'fun' about a snow day.

programme.desc: Welcome to the Chum Bucket / Frankendoodle - Mr. Krabs loses SpongeBob's fry cook contract in a bet with Plankton and SpongeBob is forced to go work at the Chum Bucket. // SpongeBob and Pat discover a pencil that makes everything they draw come to life.

programme.desc: My Leg! / Ink Lemonade - Now that Fred's leg has healed up, SpongeBob is determined to keep it out of harm's way...no matter what! // Patrick's lemonade stand isn't doing too well...until he gets a secret ingredient from Squidward!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep232

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep210

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep81

programme.desc: Dentist Trip - During a trip to the dentist, Parker remembers how the S.S. Steadfast got shipwrecked on Mt. Middlemost.

programme.desc: The Break Up - When two Croc Bandits have a spat, it's up to Po and Mr. Ping to set things right.

programme.title: Roger Ep104/Ep114/Ep124/Ep135/Ep146/Ep155/Ep165/Ep175
programme.desc: The Joystick/The Cousin/The Kite/Down In The Dumps/Only Two More Minutes/Show Time/Verrrrry Funny/Invisibly Embarrassing - Fatou is playing a video game with Roger, Junior and Igor. A loud argument erupts over who gets to use the joystick and Fatou’s father confiscates it. Igor convinces the gang that they should go “steal it back” from dad’s lab. But once there, they have to face off with a ferocious plant and they understand pretty quickly that disobeying can get you into more trouble than it’s worth. And in the end, if you all want the same thing, it’s best not to fight over it in the first place…

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep75

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep75
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep25
programme.desc: Sr. 31 - Costa Georgiadis learns why acacias are good in gardens, Jane Edmanson explores a wildflower hotspot, Tino Carnevale shares his potato-growing tips, and Jerry Coleby-Williams meets some aerial gardeners, the flying foxes.

programme.title: Restoration Australia Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Host Stuart Harrison meets a Perth couple who want to resurrect their adored family home that was lost to fire in 2015. But will they be able to rebuild the 1960s iconic modernist house as its original architect envisioned?

programme.title: Food Safari Earth Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Spring is the season that chefs look forward to most, it's when vegetables are at their sweetest and most tender. Maeve O'Meara explores the dishes of the world with chefs Stefano Manfredik, Chase Kojima, Ibrahim Kasif.

programme.title: The Pacific Ep2
programme.desc: Now more than ever we need to know what's happening in our neighbourhood. Tahlea Aualiitia and reporters undercover the stories and issues as they hear directly from people on the spot to better understand the Pacific region.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep55
programme.desc: Matthew Doran brings you all the very latest news and interviews on what's going on in the halls of Parliament House in Canberra and the topics and events making headlines from coast to coast in politics and national affairs.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep75
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you comprehensive coverage from our reporters on the ground telling you what's happening and why it matters. Presented by Miriam Corowa.

programme.title: The Drum Ep60
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's lives everyday, encouraging thoughtful and challenging debate with a diverse panel. Presented by Ellen Fanning.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep75
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Karina Carvalho.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season Ep26
programme.desc: All teams and all matches are in South Australia this weekend for the first ever AFL Gather Round. In Friday Night Footy the Sydney Swans take on the Richmond Tigers at the Adelaide Oval.

programme.title: The World Ep75
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Old People's Home For Teenagers Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - It's the end of this world first experiment where we bring two lonely groups together - teenagers and older adults. After six weeks, we'll see if they have reduced their sense of loneliness and isolation. (Final)

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep75
programme.desc: Follow the story with the latest on the day's events, explaining what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe uncovering what you need to know. Presented by Herlyn Kaur.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep11
programme.desc: In April the Reserve Bank kept rates on hold after ten consecutive interest rate rises. Will the RBA's pause continue in May as we wait to see if inflation has peaked? Or is there more pain in store for mortgage borrowers?

programme.title: ABC News Video Lab Ep2
programme.desc: Have you ever spoken about something in front of your phone, only to be spammed with ads immediately afterwards? Are companies listening to us? ABC reporter Angelique Lu runs an experiment to find out.

programme.title: Truth or Fake
programme.desc: In our fast-moving challenging world it is of fundamental importance to sort what's true from what's fake online. The Truth or Fake is a short program designed to alert everyone to the dangers of fake news. The hosts emphasize that media literacy is a key part of the broad fight against disinformation.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vera vs. Sandhagen
programme.desc: Prelims - In the UFC’s toughest division, every fight is a must win, and Top 5 bantamweight contenders Marlon Vera and Cory Sandhagen know that to get into the title conversation, a win in their UFC Fight Night main event at the AT&T Center in San Antonio on March 25 is essential to their championship hopes. Riding a four-fight winning streak that includes knockouts of UFC legends Frankie Edgar and Dominick Cruz, Vera is on the fast track to the top, but to get there, he must defeat Colorado’s Sandhagen, a versatile battler coming off a stoppage of Song Yadong to end 2022

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vera vs. Sandhagen
programme.desc: Main Event - In the UFC’s toughest division, every fight is a must win, and Top 5 bantamweight contenders Marlon Vera and Cory Sandhagen know that to get into the title conversation, a win in their UFC Fight Night main event at the AT&T Center in San Antonio on March 25 is essential to their championship hopes. programme.title: Liqui Moly Motorrad Grand Prix Deutschland Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - Car and bike races have been held on closed public roads in the area around the town of Chemnitz, Germany since the 1920s and were still taking place until as recently as 1990. It was decided, however, that the five mile course through such a densely populated area was no longer suitable and a new circuit was built five miles west of Chemnitz in 1996. Although mainly used as a driver training centre and road transport safety station, Sachsenring first hosted MotoGP in 1998 and many improvements have taken place since then, including a drastic layout enhancement in 2001. Numerous tight corners make it one of the slower tracks on the calendar but there is never any shortage of close racing action.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2305
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC 287: Pereira vs. Adesanya 2
programme.desc: Prelims - After one of the most memorable middleweight title fights in UFC history, Alex Pereira and Israel Adesanya will run it back in the main event of UFC 287 on April 8, with Pereira vowing to put an end to this rivalry once and for all, while Adesanya looks to regain the crown and even the score. In the co- main event at Miami-Dade Arena in Miami, Florida, it’s the long-awaited return of hometown hero Jorge Masvidal, as he faces number five ranked welterweight contender Gilbert Burns, who is fresh from a big win over Neil Magny in Rio de Janeiro.
